title: SNOWDON REVIEW - sans serif - font ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on this modern sans serif used for the Snowdon Review logo.

Many thanks for any help in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124020112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_ndj5rnME7l1ron07wo1_1280_5898.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_ndj5rnME7l1ron07wo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124020112/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_ndj5rnME7l1ron07wo1_1280.jpg) | 111.48 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
This is **Snowdon Display Master** by Matthew Fenton [2011] but I don't know if the font is available for purchase. You can find the project here:  
 [http://www.ok-rm.co.uk/project/snowdon-review](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124020112/http:/www.ok-rm.co.uk/project/snowdon-review "http://www.ok-rm.co.uk/project/snowdon-review")
